summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FundFlow after Cashfree payment integration fix. Backend APIs now fully functional (100% success rate). Payment integration working correctly. Frontend mostly operational with one navigation bug identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Collection cards in Browse Collections page redirect to Create Collection page instead of Collection Details page
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot access collection details from browse page

passed_tests: API Root endpoint (/api/) returns welcome message
Platform stats endpoint returns collection/donation statistics
Homepage loads with hero section and platform stats
Browse Collections page with search and category filter functionality
Collection Details page loads correctly when accessed directly
Donation form functionality with all required fields
Payment flow integration - successful order creation and redirect

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (All major flows working except collection card navigation)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix collection card navigation in Browse Collections page - cards should link to /collection/{id} instead of /create. Check CollectionCard component routing/onClick handlers.
